title: Game froze during picks and bans while i was trying to search a champ and i got a dodge
body: Hope someone at riot can help not sure why but your client keeps giving me freezes, i've managed to fix the ones in game by turning APM off on my hard drive but i still get freezing during champ select and even loading up friends etc. I got an auto dodge because game froze during my promos while I was trying to lock in a ban and it auto dodged my promos to plat. Hoping someone at riot can help reverse this. You can check into my chatlogs wiht my other freinds to see that i've been having problems with the client too. Thanks!

replies.body:
Disconnections or crashes during champ select are usually caused by the client dropping its connection to the PvP.net service. This service syncs your actions to the server and notifies you of other's actions. If you disconnect from this service at any time, it can cause the symptoms you're seeing.

We cannot reverse the losses, but we can work together to resolve this. I recommend your next step be working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are optimized for League. Let me know if those steps caused any change.

happened again this time my whole game froze and now i'm getting really salty game crashed right when i clicked accept then i try to log back in says reconnecting to chat hten i try to click play and I got this. that is the 2nd loss i got in gold 1 promos today each in a new series. I did not dodge twice now can someone please look into this. I can try and provide a crashlog for the 2nd time too.
